file_content.text: Master Orgus... the Death Mark device is destroyed, but I was scanned by it.
Darth Angral's apprentice is targeting me. I'm on my way to his stronghold. Where are you?
Too far to help. I misled you back at the camp.
I haven't been searching for the apprentice. I've been hunting Darth Angral--and I just found his cruiser.
General Var Suthra's been hunting him for days without success.
How did you manage that?
The general doesn't have the Force as his ally. It called, and I followed.
We should alert the fleet. They'll destroy him.
Great news, Master.
Won't be that easy.
I thought Jedi were supposed to be honest.
You lied to me.
Didn't want you following me. Someone has to save Alderaan.
The cruiser is at the edge of the system, outside the reach of planetary sensors; it's about to jump for hyperspace.
This may be our only shot at stopping him. I'm boarding that cruiser. Just wanted someone to know, in case....
You're a great Jedi, Master. If anyone can stop Angral, it's you.
May the Force be with you.
You're the finest student I've ever trained. Wish I'd met you sooner.
Maybe I can find a way to avoid the Death Mark, join you out there.
Wait for me.
From what you've told me, neither of us has much time. This is how it has to be.
You're a fool to go there without me. You'll get yourself killed.
In case you fail miserably?
Thanks for the vote of confidence.
Stop Angral's apprentice. Save Alderaan. May the Force be with you. Orgus out.
Get to House Thul. Stop Aleyna and take back the Death Mark.
You're in charge of recovering the Death Mark from House Thul. I have my own mission.
There's only a few places Angral's apprentice could be operating from. We need to narrow down that list of candidates.
I'll come with you, then we'll go to House Thul.
We shouldn't split up.
You just going to wander around the planet?
How will you do that?
Much as I enjoy the weather, no. I'll go where the Force leads me.
We should focus all our efforts on securing the Death Mark device.
Don't waste your time.
For all we know, Angral's apprentice copied the technology. We can't risk him escaping.
Our destinies part here, my friend. I'll contact you when I've found our enemy.
I hope to hear from both of you when this threat is ended.
Head for House Thul. May the Force be with you.
I deactivated the laser's power stations, but Darth Angral's apprentice contacted me.
Dozens of innocent people are targets of the Death Mark.
We need to end this before he brings that laser back online.
This is Wynne Organa, chief negotiator of the peace talks to end this war.
Aleyna Hark had free run of Organa Palace. Everyone there could be a target, including me.
I saw her surrender to the guards when Count Alde was assassinated.
You have her in custody.
She never made it to her cell. The guards escorting her were found dead.
The last time I saw Aleyna, she was still in your city.
Then we'd better find her.
We lost track of her in the chaos after Count Alde's death.
Every person who's been targeted needs to leave this planet.
Get off Alderaan.
If we abandon Alderaan, all hope for peace is lost.
If you're marked for death, why hasn't the Sith already killed you?
How are you alive?
I don't know, but my people are living in terror.
There's more bad news. Aleyna escaped Organa Palace after you left.
There's more bad news. Aleyna fled Organa Palace after you left.
However, my spies report a woman matching her description entered House Thul's compound.
House Thul? They support the Empire.
Yes, but Duke Thul openly advocates the peace process. I thought he was sincere.
What if the Sith want to silence him?
The last thing Darth Angral wants is peace.
I wouldn't put it past them.
Can we send a message to Duke Thul? Let him know of the danger?
Let's warn him.
We'd have to use formal diplomatic channels. There's no guarantee he'd receive our warning, much less believe it.
If Duke Thul is killed by a Republic secret weapon, the peace process will never recover.
Hate to say it, but our best bet is to storm in there and stop Aleyna.
Won't violence damage the peace process even worse?
Attack during peace talks?
I suspect the duke will forgive us when we save his life.
You're giving the enemy too much credit, Orgus.
Don't be so naive.
Either way, the Death Mark is at House Thul. If we want it, we'll have to take it.
I'm ready to go when you are, Master.
May the Force be with us.
I'm hoping you have something in mind other than a frontal assault.
Do you have a plan?
How you get in there is your business.
That'll never work.
Have a little faith in yourself.
Shut down the laser's power stations. I'll get Doctor Parvux to safety.
You alright, doctor?
Don't worry about me. The Death Mark is in enemy hands... you must warn Count Alde.
The count was just killed by the Death Mark.
The targeting device was taken to Organa Palace....
Have you met a woman calling herself Aleyna Hark?
She was with me when Count Alde died. She sent me here.
I'm here because of her.
Must have thought the Killiks would get rid of you for her.
When the count died, his guards tried to arrest me. She surrendered in my place so I could come here.
She's been arrested.
It was a trick. She had no intention of becoming a prisoner.
There was a survivor from this facility with Count Alde.
You mean the scientist?
We're the only survivors. The girl's an assassin.
You're losing me, old man. What's the Mirialan girl got to do with this?
Whoa, slow down.
Aleyna's a spy. She helped the Sith steal the Death Mark, and now she's targeting people with it.
She could've marked dozens of people by now. The weapon's laser can kill them at any time, anywhere.
Not if we cut its power. The laser's still tied into the local energy grid, right?
Several power stations supply the laser. Deactivating them would take the laser offline, at least temporarily.
Get the doctor to safety. I'll deactivate the power stations.
Leave it to me, Master.
Isn't there a central computer controlling the laser? Can't we just shut it down from here?
Is there a permanent solution?
The Sith took everything with him. We'll have to do this the hard way.
The fastest way to save lives is to hunt down that Sith.
Let's focus on the enemy.
We don't know where to look. Cutting off the laser's power supply will buy us time.
I'll get Doctor Parvux to safety. You deactivate the laser's power stations.
I have coordinates to every station. Deactivate them in the order I've described. Don't leave even one functional.
We'll head to the closest Republic-friendly camp. Meet us there. May the Force be with you.
Heh... what took you so long?
They said you were dead. Thank the Force you're alive!
Master Orgus!
The Force, and my lightsaber. Needed both this time.
Sorry, Master. All the speeders were taken.
I had to walk here.
I'll let it go, but only this once.
I was told a Sith killed you in a duel. How are you still walking around?
You're supposed to be dead.
Try not to sound so disappointed.
You've looked better, Master. Sure you're alright?
I've looked worse, Kira. I'll be fine.
Master Orgus = wounded // Medical evacuation = recommended
Relax, Teeseven. I'm still in one piece.
Blasted Sith almost killed me. Was all I could do to save Doctor Parvux.
The enemy left us here as food for the Killiks.
Taking down that Killik leader must have been quite a fight. Thing was huge.
Master, I don't know what you're talking about.
I didn't fight a huge Killik.
The giant Killik leading these others. You didn't see it?
If I did kill it, I didn't notice.
Maybe I missed it?
Impossible. It's the size of a....
I tossed a rancor dance troupe at it. Never stood a chance.
You're hallucinating.
You didn't see it, did you?
If that thing eats us... you're fired.
No time for questions--got a planet to save. Excuse me.
Shutting down the laser's power stations will buy us time we need to find our enemy.
If that thing eats us... you're fired.
